item.title: melonDS Installation and Configuration
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
melonDS Installation and Configuration

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

Learn how to install and configure melonDS for optimal Nintendo DS emulation. Complete guide with BIOS, graphics settings and advanced features.

Published on 2025-06-02 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-06-07
